scripts.local: npm run stop-containers && testrail=false environment=staging profile=local codeceptjs run --steps
scripts.docker: testrail=$TESTRAIL environment=$ENV profile=docker GREP=$GREP testsfilter=$TESTSFILTER codeceptjs run
scripts.codeceptjs-docker: docker run --name codeceptjs -h codeceptjs --link selenium:selenium -v $(pwd):/tests -e testrail=false -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -e profile=docker-local -e environment=staging -e CODECEPT_ARGS=--steps 10.10.8.47:5000/codeceptjs:0.6.3-local
scripts.local-docker: npm run stop-containers && npm run selenium-docker && npm run codeceptjs-docker
scripts.stop-containers: docker stop selenium codeceptjs || true && docker rm selenium codeceptjs || true
